name: PHLivePhotoViewDelegate
desc: The PHLivePhotoViewDelegate protocol describes messages sent by a PHLivePhotoView instance in response to playback events when playing the motion and sound content associated with a Live Photo. To receive these messages, implement the methods in this protocol in one of your controller objects and assign that object to the delegate property of a Live Photo view.

items.name: func livePhotoView(PHLivePhotoView, canBeginPlaybackWith: PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle) -> Bool
items.desc: Notifies the delegate to determine if the Live Photo can begin playback.

items.name: func livePhotoView(PHLivePhotoView, willBeginPlaybackWith: PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that Live Photo playback is beginning.

items.name: func livePhotoView(PHLivePhotoView, didEndPlaybackWith: PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that Live Photo playback ended.
